Validar Regla de Cálculo de Costes

value.original: Validate and initialize the Costing Rule. It automatically creates and process the Close and Opening Physical inventories to overwrite an existing Costing Rule. If the instance is using the legacy engine costs it is mandatory to run the Cost Migration Process in advance with System Administrator role.

row.value: Valida e inicializa la Regla de cálculo de costes. Crea y procesa automáticamente los inventarios de cierre y apertura para sobrescribir la regla de cálculo de costes existente. Si la instancia usa el motor de costes antiguo, se requiere ejecutar el Proceso de Migración de Costes por adelantado con el rol de Administrador del Sistema.

Actualización Valor Inventario

value.original: Generates 2 closing/opening inventories and generates a cost adjustment document

row.value: Genera 2 inventarios de cierre/apertura y un documento de ajuste de coste

value.original: Generates 2 closing/opening inventories. Closing inventory cost is the inventory amount on that moment. The costing background should be disabled during this process to avoid being it calculated as usual. Opening inventory cost is the desired amount (average). Generates a Cost Adjustment Document so the cost is adjusted to the reference date in case this is a different date than the current one. Sets all transactions prior to the reference date as permanently adjusted.

row.value: Genera 2 inventarios de cierre/apertura. El coste del inventario de cierre representa el importe en aquel momento. El proceso de background de costes debería ser deshabilitado durante este proceso para impedir que éste sea calculado como habitualmente. El coste del inventario de apertura es el importe deseado (media). Genera un Documento de Ajuste de Costes de tal forma que el coste se ajusta a la fecha de referencia en caso de ser una fecha distinta de la actual. Se establecen todas las transacciones anteriores a la fecha de referencia como permanentemente ajustadas.

Cancelar y Reemplazar Pedido de Venta

value.original: This process action will open a copy of the current row in edit mode. After changing the desired values press Confirm Cancel And Replace in order to create a copy of the opened Sales Order but with negative quantities and complete it. Afterwards the process will create a new Sales Order with the new values.

row.value: El proceso abrirá una copia del registro actual en modo edición. Cuando haya terminado de cambiar valores deseados presione Confirmar Cancelar Y Reemplazar para crear una copia del pedido de venta abierto con cantidades negativas y completarlo. Finalmente el proceso creará un nuevo pedido de venta con los nuevos valores.

Proceso Ajuste Diferencias de Precio

value.original: This process allows to adjust the cost of a transaction, caused by a price difference between the order and the corresponding invoice.

row.value: This process allows to adjust the cost of a transaction, caused by a price difference between the order and the corresponding invoice.

value.original: Price difference adjustments can be performed "automatically" by scheduling the "Price Correction Background Process" or manually for a given product or set of products by running this process.

row.value: Price difference adjustments can be performed "automatically" by scheduling the "Price Correction Background Process" or manually for a given product or set of products by running this process.
Establecer nueva moneda

value.original: Sets new currency for the customer

row.value: Establece una nueva moneda para el tercero

value.original: Sets new currency for the customer. If the amount is specified, the new customer balance will be set to this amount. If the exchange rate is specified, the new customer balance will be calculated with the specified exchange rate. If the amount and exchange rates are not specified, default conversion rate will be applied for the new customer balance.

row.value: Establece una nueva moneda para el tercero. Si se especifica un importe, éste se establecerá directamente como nuevo balance del tercero. Si se especifica un tipo de cambio, éste se usará para calcular el nuevo balance del tercero. Si no se especifica ni el importe ni el tipo de cambio, se usará el tipo de cambio global para calcular el nuevo balance.

Reactivar Landed Cost
Reinicializar cuentas
Reinicializar cuentas

value.original: The reset accounting process allows to totally or partially remove the ledger entries of an organization. The ledger entries can be massively re-created again by using the "Accounting Server Process" or the "G/L Posting by DB Tables" process. The manual changes done for the accounting entries description will obviously be lost after running this process

row.value: Reinicializar cuentas permite eliminar registros de la contabilidad de una organización. La contabilidad se puede vover a generar mediante la ejecución del proceso 'Proceso contable' o en la ventana 'Proceso contable'. Los cambios manuales realizados en las descripciones de los asientos se perderán después de ejecutar este proceso.
Corrección Manual del Coste

value.original: Manual Cost Adjustment process: Generates a cost adjustment document. and adds a line for the given transaction.

row.value: Manual Cost Adjustment process: Generates a cost adjustment document. and adds a line for the given transaction.

value.original: Manual Cost Adjustment process: Generates a cost adjustment document. and adds a line for the given transaction.

row.value: Proceso de Ajuste Manual de Costes: Genera un documento de ajuste de costes y añade una línea a la transacción dada.

Recalcular Permisos de Rol

value.original: This process recalculates role permissions, based on the role inheritance defined. Depending on the role type the behavior varies: - If the role is a template one, the permissions for the role will be recalculated and also propagated to every role which is currently inheriting from this template. - If the role is not marked as template, just the permissions for this role are recalculated. For details - http://wiki.openbravo.com/wiki/Role#Permissions_Inheritance

row.value: This process recalculates role permissions, based on the role inheritance defined. Depending on the role type the behavior varies: - If the role is a template one, the permissions for the role will be recalculated and also propagated to every role which is currently inheriting from this template. - If the role is not marked as template, just the permissions for this role are recalculated.
